content: looking for a cute crochet amigurumi that works up fast check the no-sew squid family pattern easy and fun crochet pattern set mama and baby squid the baby comes out of mama squid perfect for children s play even better this pattern is no sew not even a single part to attach this pattern requires no sewing 100% no sew this pattern includes * step-by-step written instructions photo and video tutorials to guide you through * video tutorial for mini squid materials * plush yarn tapestry needle safety eyes fiberfill for stuffing crochet hook * you can use any weight of yarn for this project difficulty advanced beginner skills required crocheting in spiral magic_ring chain slip_stitch single_crochet stitch increasing and decreasing if you have any questions contact us via private message
